amendment.description: An amendment numbered 20 printed in Part B of House Report 118-30 to prohibit the Communist Party of China (or a person acting on behalf of the Communist Party of China) from acquiring any interest with respect to American farmland or any lands used for American renewable energy production.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits the Communist Party of China (or a person acting on behalf of the Communist Party of China) from acquiring any interest with respect to American farmland or any lands used for American renewable energy production.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Westerman amendment (A020) Agreed to by recorded vote: 407 - 26 (Roll no. 174).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Westerman.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Westerman amendment (A020) Agreed to by recorded vote: 407 - 26 (Roll no. 174).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
